      • can_move

        private boolean can_move(int x,
                         int y,
                         PlayerControl.DIR dir)
        Parameters:
        x - current x position of the player
        y - current y position of the player
        dir - the direction the player wants to go to
        Returns:
        true is the player can move from the position (x,y) to the adjacent tiles according to dir, false otherwise.
